# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than what most people are willing to pay. Considering its value, I'm offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exceptional benefits and experiences it provides. I hope you find this offer compelling and decide to make the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
